net.bytebuddy.agent.builder

接口 AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.AtFixedRate, AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.NoOp, AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.WithFixedDelay
    封闭类:
    AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy

    public static interface AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler
    A resubmission scheduler is responsible for scheduling a job that is resubmitting unloaded types that failed during retransformation.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.AtFixedRate
      A resubmission scheduler that schedules jobs at a fixed rate.
      static interface  AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.Cancelable
      A cancelable allows to discontinue a resubmission job.
      static class  AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.NoOp
      A resubmission scheduler that does not apply any scheduling.
      static class  AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.WithFixedDelay
      A resubmission scheduler that schedules jobs with a fixed delay.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean isAlive()
      Checks if this scheduler is currently available.
      AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.Cancelable schedule(Runnable job)
      Schedules a resubmission job for regular application.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Checks if this scheduler is currently available.
        返回:
        true if this scheduler is alive.

      • schedule

        AgentBuilder.RedefinitionStrategy.ResubmissionScheduler.Cancelable schedule(Runnable job)
        Schedules a resubmission job for regular application.
        参数:
        job - The job to schedule.
        返回:
        A cancelable that is canceled upon resetting the corresponding class file transformer.
